Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Launch the people's war and win the war of resistance" (发动人民战争赢得抗战胜利), this first part (of two) covers the "Anti-Japanese War Period 1937-1945"  (抗日战争时期 1937-1945).It shows Yan'an; the Yan'an pagoda; cavalry; construction projects; anti-Japanese war efforts.
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Yan'anThe Second Sino-Japanese War (1937-1945)
